column5: Anyone know where i can find chubby darters?   Last season i ordered some online.   I think they came from the north bay area?    Dont remember if i got them from the salmo website or not.     Thanks in advance...
I found some today at Gannon's in Oshawa. Great little bait.

Jim's got a wack of them at Dad's in Temagami... but he closed for the winter as not enough business coming through town unfortunately... with the clipped fishing seasons in the "new" Zone 11 !  He will open up for you if he has advance notice of arrival though...
I got some from Cabelas online..
hey buckster i found two on ebay just search the name "chubby darter" tight lines
Hey  Tony,  I'm going duck hunting in the morning, then thursday getting my ice gear ready. When are you done work  We got some fish to catch up with buddy!  S.

You can also grab some at Fishing World in Hamilton. I especially like the new holographic finishes that Salmo brough out, will work great for perch and crappies, however pike seem to like them as well...
Indeed we do!  23rd is my last day, then the real work begins... drill,clean and jig!
www.salmoontario.com  I reccomend them and their products highly. They are a great bunch of guys. Cheers, Mark
Sweet! Me too. Off till the 4th, then my same weekdays off! Lets get 'er done!  S.

Not sure where you're located, buckster, but when I was at BassPro, I found the Lindy Darter...looks very similar to a salmo, but a nicer paint job and better looking hooks...I picked it up because it was cheaper than the Salmo. Just my $0.02...I know they're at BPS...not sure about other spots.
I'm looking forward to trying the Lindy Darter this winter myself.  Hope to pick some up in Thunder Bay when I head down there over the holidays.
Yeah im fully stocked with  those they should work well but im kinda faithful to a certain colour and size chubby D

Just looked up the Linday.  Wow - what a blatant ripoff of the chubby darter.   Lindy should be ashamed.  I guess that's the fishing lure business though, huh?  btw - salmo ontario is a good site.  i bought from them last year.  Came in the mail in a few days
I have all sorts of new ones kicking around still in the packages shoot me a PM with what your looking for if I have it I'll sell them cheap.
